code: import _objectSpread from"/home/goyal/cohort-g/projects/gitfunc/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{ALL_USERS,RESET_LOADING,RESET_USER,SET_LOADING,SET_USER}from"../types";var githubReducer=function githubReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case ALL_USERS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{users:action.payload,loading:false});case SET_LOADING:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:true});case SET_USER:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{user:action.payload.user,repos:action.payload.repos,loading:false});case RESET_USER:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{repos:[],user:{}});case RESET_LOADING:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:false});default:{throw Error("State Logic Error");}}};export default githubReducer;
